data.text: @SDECoxHealth Nice work to you and your staff. This regional community depends on you and thanks you so very very much.
@SDECoxHealth @everstrange Wow, amazing.  Hopefully as the weather improves and people party, the numbers won't go up.  This is a good sign!
@SDECoxHealth You’ve done an incredible job through this pandemic of keeping the public informed of the critical concerns that protect everyone’s safety.
@SDECoxHealth @CoxHealth Thanks for keeping us informed. Keeping these numbers low still requires being vigilant and following best practices.
@SDECoxHealth Thank you again for all your hard work and the hard work of your staff.  All of you are angels sent from above.
@Brian_LaFevre_ @SDECoxHealth Do a search on Eric Topol.  He's been posting some stuff that we may finally have enough resistance built between infections and vaccines to do some good.
@SDECoxHealth R&R time for nurses and doctors now?
